welcomeSubtitle: Your all-in-one tool for academic success.
welcomeDescription: A comprehensive tool to support university and high school students for better writing, research, and study.
articleWriterDescription: Generate well-structured academic articles with citation support (APA, MLA, IEEE).
reportGeneratorDescription: Interactive system that guides you through creating comprehensive research reports.
grammarCheckerDescription: Advanced grammar and style correction for academic writing.
mindMapGeneratorDescription: Transform your ideas into dynamic mind maps for brainstorming.
summarizerParaphraserDescription: Academic-level summaries and paraphrasing while preserving meaning.
plagiarismCheckerDescription: Identify duplicated text and suggest original alternatives.
flashcardGeneratorDescription: Create study flashcards from your notes and textbooks.
quizGeneratorDescription: Generate quizzes from your notes and textbooks.
presentationGeneratorDescription: Create academic presentations with structured formatting.
taskPlannerDescription: Timeline-based planner for assignments and research projects.
writingSupervisorDescription: Get real-time feedback and suggestions as you write.
quickActionsSubtitle: The best tools for your academic success.
